statements: CREATE TABLE patients (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10)
CREATE TABLE appointments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, date DATE, patient_id INT, doctor_id INT)
CREATE TABLE Patients (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50), age INT, gender VARCHAR(10), diagnosis VARCHAR(100);
CREATE TABLE Doctors (doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, doctor_name VARCHAR(50), specialization VARCHAR(50), hospital_name VARCHAR(100);
CREATE TABLE Appointments (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, doctor_id INT, appointment_date DATE, appointment_time TIME, status VARCHAR(20));
